abstract: Stocks fall as investors react with alarm to Chinese trade data and drop in crude oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were lower, led by declines in materials and energy companies. Traders were also discouraged by weak trade figures from China.

headline.main: Market Retreats as Materials and Energy Stocks Tumble
headline.print_headline: Broad Retreat in Market After a Weak Report on China Trade

snippet: Stocks were lower, led by declines in materials and energy companies. Traders were also discouraged by weak trade figures from China.
